#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t=0;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
            int counter=0;
           string x;
           cin>>x;
           for(int i=0;i<x.length();i++){
            if(x[i]=='B')counter+=2;
            else if(x[i]=='A'||x[i]=='D'||x[i]=='Q'||x[i]=='R'||x[i]=='O'||x[i]=='P')
            counter++;
            }
        cout<<counter<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
